  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GLMapItem2, MapItem.OnAltitudeModeChangedListener, MapItem.OnClickableChangedListener, MapItem.OnHeightChangedListener, MapItem.OnVisibleChangedListener, MapItem.OnZOrderChangedListener, Polyline.OnHeightStyleChangedListener, Polyline.OnLabelsChangedListener, Polyline.OnLabelTextSizeChanged, Shape.OnBasicLineStyleChangedListener, Shape.OnFillColorChangedListener, Shape.OnPointsChangedListener, Shape.OnStrokeColorChangedListener, Shape.OnStrokeWeightChangedListener, Shape.OnStyleChangedListener

    public class GLTrackPolyline
extends GLPolyline
    For drawing a crumb trail polyline Note: Crumb trail polylines cannot be filled
